Yop ! Rebuild this tread with sub-tab , seems to be easy and more pratical .

So , begin with the Civil crafts , Copter then Jet fighter & Tank . Kethane Soons !

All Jet Fighters from Civil tab are [sTOCK] exept Falcon 20 !

Usefull Mods : Improved Camera , Take Command , Kerpaint .

[Back to Menu](%5Brelpath%5D%5B/relpath%5D#%252%24s)

The key-bind for most of them :

1 - Toggle Jet Engine(s)

<- Toggle A.I , Autopilot , Guard Mode

G - Drop CM

R - Fire

Space - Next Weapon ( Drop Tank )
